api_list.name: Mark a platform alert as read
api_list.description: Marks a platform alert as required
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com/v4/alert/0/read"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com/v4/alert/{alertid}/read"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Login
api_list.description:
Exchanges a user/password combination for an access token for further API usage

If your account is verified or you are a donator use USER_ELEVATED to have access to more features, if you are neither of them use the USER scope
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com/v4/user/login"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freemcserver.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
